data.eml:eml: Biology and description of Megaprosternum cleonarovorum sp. nov. (Hymenoptera: Bethylidae) a gregarious larval ectoparasitoid of Cleonaria bicolor Thomson (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Gupta, Ankita, Rajeshwari, S. K., Azevedo, Celso O. (2017): Biology and description of Megaprosternum cleonarovorum sp. nov. (Hymenoptera: Bethylidae) a gregarious larval ectoparasitoid of Cleonaria bicolor Thomson (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India. Zootaxa 4237 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4237.1.4
